document.masterDocTitle: On the taxonomy and zoogeography of some Palaearctic Paederinae and Xantholinini (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: On the taxonomy and zoogeography of some Palaearctic Paederinae and Xantholinini (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:

24.V.-5.VI.2001
, leg. Valcárcel (cSch)
;
1 ex. , same data, but
30.V.-17.VI.2002
(cSch)
;
1 ex. [teneral], same data, but
20.-26.VI.2001
(cSch). Italy : 1 ex. , Toscana ,
50 km W Firenze
, Padule del Fucecchio ,
16.VI.1992
, leg. Assing (cAss)
;
4 exs. , Puglia, San Cataldo ( LE ), Riserva WWF Le Cesine ,

, leg. Angelini (cAss). Germany : 2 exs. , Brandenburg , Storkow env., NSG "Salzstelle Philadelphia", sifted from straw,

;

;

;

;

700 m
,

, leg. Besuchet (cAss)
;

25 km S Kumkale
, Beşik Koyu ["Besika Bay", ca. 39°49'N , 26°10'E ], leg. Walker ( BMNH )

.

C o m m e n t: The species is widespread in the Western Palaearctic region and has been reported also from the Afrotropical, Australian, and Nearctic regions ( SMETANA 2004 ). It is newly reported from Kazakhstan and Middle Asia.
